welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Chosei, Japan! Known for its beautiful landscapes and charming small-town feel, we invite you to experience the unique culture and warm hospitality of our city. Enjoy your stay and explore all that Chosei has to offer."

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for international flights, with a variety of shops, restaurants, and services available.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The secondary terminal for international flights, with a focus on low-cost carriers and budget travel options.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: The newest terminal for domestic flights, with modern facilities and a wide range of dining and shopping options.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to this network for free for up to 3 hours.
